metadata.name: Shela, A Hat Story #001 - Dont-key
metadata.description:
Shela, A Hat Story, 01/50

The only allowable transport to the festival and on the Island in general. Donkeys hold a special place in the island and in the lives of the people of Lamu and it features in their day to day activities. 

———————————————

This collection radiates the essence of the art & craft currency that has washed up the shores of Lamu, Kenya for centuries. 50 most eccentric & most unorthodox hats adorned by their masterful creators in perfect glowing melanin-centric portraiture. 
This is Shela, A Hat Story 

———————————————

February, 2018.

Format: 4163 X 4163 px , photo.
